00037 namespace Hyperspace {
00038 
00039   class Event : public Hypertable::ReferenceCount {
00040   public:
00041     Event(uint32_t mask) : m_mask(mask), m_notification_count(0) {
00042       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(ms_next_event_id_mutex);
00043       m_id = ms_next_event_id++;
00044       return;
00045     }
00046     virtual ~Event() { return; }
00047 
00048     uint64_t get_id() { return m_id; }
00049 
00050     uint32_t get_mask() { return m_mask; }
00051 
00052     void increment_notification_count() {
00053       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00054       m_notification_count++;
00055     }
00056     void decrement_notification_count() {
00057       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00058       m_notification_count--;
00059       if (m_notification_count == 0)
00060         m_cond.notify_all();
00061     }
00062     void wait_for_notifications() {
00063       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00064       if (m_notification_count != 0)
00065         m_cond.wait(lock);
00066     }
00067 
00068     virtual uint32_t encoded_length() = 0;
00069     virtual void encode(Hypertable::CommBuf *cbuf) = 0;
00070 
00071   protected:
00072 
00073     static boost::mutex  ms_next_event_id_mutex;
00074     static uint64_t      ms_next_event_id;
00075 
00076     boost::mutex      m_mutex;
00077     boost::condition  m_cond;
00078     uint64_t m_id;
00079     uint32_t m_mask;
00080     uint32_t m_notification_count;
00081   };
00082 
00083   typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<Event> HyperspaceEventPtr;

00090   class EventNamed : public Event {
00091   public:
00092     EventNamed(uint32_t mask, const std::string &name)
00093         : Event(mask), m_name(name) { return; }
00094 
00095     virtual uint32_t encoded_length() {
00096       return 12 + Hypertable::Serialization::encoded_length_vstr(m_name);
00097     }
00098 
00099     virtual void encode(Hypertable::CommBuf *cbuf) {
00100       cbuf->append_i64(m_id);
00101       cbuf->append_i32(m_mask);
00102       cbuf->append_vstr(m_name);
00103     }
00104 
00105   private:
00106     std::string m_name;
00107   };

00114   class EventLockAcquired : public Event {
00115   public:
00116     EventLockAcquired(uint32_t mode) : Event(EVENT_MASK_LOCK_ACQUIRED), m_mode(mode) { return; }
00117     virtual uint32_t encoded_length() { return 16; }
00118     virtual void encode(Hypertable::CommBuf *cbuf) {
00119       cbuf->append_i64(m_id);
00120       cbuf->append_i32(m_mask);
00121       cbuf->append_i32(m_mode);
00122     }
00123   private:
00124     uint32_t m_mode;
00125   };

00131   class EventLockReleased : public Event {
00132   public:
00133     EventLockReleased() : Event(EVENT_MASK_LOCK_RELEASED) { return; }
00134     virtual uint32_t encoded_length() { return 12; }
00135     virtual void encode(Hypertable::CommBuf *cbuf) {
00136       cbuf->append_i64(m_id);
00137       cbuf->append_i32(m_mask);
00138     }
00139   };

00145   class EventLockGranted : public Event {
00146   public:
00147     EventLockGranted(uint32_t mode, uint64_t generation) : Event(EVENT_MASK_LOCK_GRANTED), m_mode(mode), m_generation(generation) { return; }
00148     virtual uint32_t encoded_length() { return 24; }
00149     virtual void encode(Hypertable::CommBuf *cbuf) {
00150       cbuf->append_i64(m_id);
00151       cbuf->append_i32(m_mask);
00152       cbuf->append_i32(m_mode);
00153       cbuf->append_i64(m_generation);
00154     }
